description: Browse directories and read files within a safe, configurable root. Pull accurate context from local projects and docs without leaving your workflow. Limit access to a chosen root to keep your environment secure.

FS_ROOT.description: 파일시스템 루트 경로 (MCP 클라이언트가 접근할 수 있는 최상위 디렉토리)

GITHUB_ROOT.description: GitHub 루트 경로 (FS_ROOT 대신 사용 가능)

capabilities.name: read_text_file
capabilities.description: Read a text file from the filesystem. Returns the file content as text.

capabilities.name: write_file
capabilities.description: Write content to a file. Creates the file if it doesn't exist, overwrites if it does.

capabilities.name: list_directory
capabilities.description: List files and directories in a specified path

capabilities.name: create_directory
capabilities.description: Create a directory. Creates parent directories if they don't exist.

capabilities.name: get_file_info
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a file or directory (size, permissions, timestamps, etc.)

capabilities.name: move_file
capabilities.description: Move or rename a file or directory

capabilities.name: search_files
capabilities.description: Recursively search for files and directories matching a pattern
